name: Target Commerce Connector
description: Connector powering Salsify's Target Plus integration. This service handles both content publish and inventory/orders integrations for Target Plus marketplace sellers. It includes functionality for generating Target Plus target schemas from Target's Taxonomy API and publishing products via Target's Seller API.

name: Target Plus Marketplace
description: Target's third-party marketplace platform where sellers can list and sell products on Target.com. Salsify integrates with Target Plus to enable content publishing, inventory management, and order processing for marketplace sellers.

name: Target Distribution Center ID
description: Identifier for a Target Plus Distribution Center object that Salsify uses when publishing product inventory. Required for inventory/orders integration but not for content publish only.

name: Target Seller ID
description: Unique identifier for a seller's account on the Target Plus marketplace. Found in the Target marketplace seller portal and always required for channel configuration.

name: Target Seller Token
description: API access token used by Salsify when interacting with the Target Plus API on behalf of a seller. Generated by the seller via the Target Plus portal and treated as sensitive/secured data.

name: Target Taxonomy API
description: Target's API for fetching data about product categories, fields, and their requirements. Used by Salsify to generate target schemas containing all fields, product categories (taxonomies), field visibility/requirements per taxonomy, and enum values.

name: Target Seller API
description: Target's API used by Salsify for publishing products and syncing inventory/orders on the Target Plus marketplace.
